page.title: 07EMPLOYMENT IN BRIDGEND
page.content: Our survey found that many parents of the children in Penybont Primary School work in{factories}in the light industrial estates situated at {Waterton}and{Litchard.}Other professions include{mechanics,drivers, {tradesmen in service industries,}while many mothers work in the hospitals which are spread around the area as {nurses or cleaners,or in local shops. But the majority of mothers who do work usually only do so on a{part_time basis. The following trends were also noted:- {1.Few parents travel out of the area {to their places of employment. {2.The high number of parents who are {unemployed. {3.There is no one major employer or {type of employment in the area. {4.Both mothers and fathers work in {many families.
